catalyst: The catalysts used in the experiment are TRP, TRP-NH2 (c), g-C3N4, and P25.
reaction medium: Based on the text, the photocatalytic CO2 reduction performances were evaluated at room temperature (ca. 20 C) under ambient pressure. This suggests the reaction medium is likely a gas, as the reaction is performed under ambient pressure and the products are measured using gas chromatography. However, the phrase "in situ FT-IR analysis" indicates the presence of a liquid medium.
